moves.1. e4:
Tied in Knots....

A game where I felt comfortable, got complacent and was done like a kipper.
moves.1... e6 2. d4 d5 3. exd5 exd5 4. Qe2+ Be: All fairly standard, no fireworks so far.
moves.9. Qd3 Nc6 10. Ne5 Re8 11. O-O-O: Bad choice as it turns out.
moves.11... Be7 12. Nxc6 bxc6 13. h3 Rb8 14. g: More than a little bemused by that move.
moves.15. Na4 Rb7 16. Bxf6 Bxf6 17. Nc5 Rb6 18: At this point I'm quite happy, level on material and with (imho) slightly better development.
moves.19. f5 Re4 20. c3 Qb8 21. b3: Yes yes yes, you can't get me, I've got a pawn wall.
moves.22. axb3 Qxb3: Well that wasn't so bad. Need to get the king back over to safety but thats ok.
moves.23. Qc2 Bg5+:
And thats the move which will haunt me. Unable to move the king my choices go summat like this....

r-d2..r-e1, q-d1..rxq#
q-d2..bxq or q-a3 or...well.... you get the idea.

I cried and then wimped out.
